Source code for api.users.v1.test_helpers.group.get_group_by_name



[docs]def success(function):
    """Mock https://portal.mnemonic.no/web/api/users/v1/group/\w+, respond with HTTP 200"""
    import requests_mock
    from argus_api.helpers.tests import fake_response
    def mock_response(*args, **kwargs):
        with requests_mock.Mocker(real_http=True) as mock:
            mock.register_uri(
                "GET",
                r"https://portal.mnemonic.no/web/api/users/v1/group/\w+",
                status_code=200,
                json=fake_response({'offset': {'type': 'int', 'name': 'offset'}, 'limit': {'type': 'int', 'name': 'limit'}, 'responseCode': {'type': 'int', 'name': 'responseCode'}, 'count': {'type': 'int', 'name': 'count'}, 'metaData': {'type': 'dict', 'additionalProperties': {'type': 'dict'}, 'name': 'metaData'}, 'messages': {'type': 'list', 'items': {'message': {'type': 'str'}, 'messageTemplate': {'type': 'str'}, 'type': 'str', 'field': {'type': 'str'}, 'parameter': {'type': 'dict'}, 'timestamp': {'type': 'int'}, 'options': ['FIELD_ERROR', 'ACTION_ERROR', 'WARNING', 'NOTIFICATION', 'INFO']}, 'name': 'messages'}, 'currentPage': {'type': 'int', 'name': 'currentPage'}, 'size': {'type': 'int', 'name': 'size'}})
            )
            return function(*args, **kwargs)
        return mock_response
    return decorator

    """Mock https://portal.mnemonic.no/web/api/users/v1/group/\w+, respond with HTTP 401"""
    import requests_mock
    from argus_api.helpers.tests import fake_response

            mock.register_uri(
                "GET",
                r"https://portal.mnemonic.no/web/api/users/v1/group/\w+",
                status_code=401,
                json=None
            )
            return function(*args, **kwargs)
        return mock_response
    return decorator

[docs]def not_found(function):
    """Mock https://portal.mnemonic.no/web/api/users/v1/group/\w+, respond with HTTP 404"""
    import requests_mock
    from argus_api.helpers.tests import fake_response
    def mock_response(*args, **kwargs):
        with requests_mock.Mocker(real_http=True) as mock:
            mock.register_uri(
                "GET",
                r"https://portal.mnemonic.no/web/api/users/v1/group/\w+",
                status_code=404,
                json=None
            )
            return function(*args, **kwargs)
        return mock_response
    return decorator
